title: Executive Order 5460-Petroleum Restoration No. 59, Colorado
content: So much of the order of October 25, 1918, creating Petroleum Reserve No. 61, Colorado No. 2, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked, and all such lands not otherwise reserved or withdrawn are hereby restored to the public domain and to disposition under the laws applicable thereto.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5460-Petroleum Restoration No. 59, Colorado Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361095
